post.body: Uh oh, are you getting an error message? Im thinking its from the surge of traffic from mashable, not that I'm complaining :)
Ooops, no I didn't see them, replying now :)
Thanks for your understanding, We apologize for this.
It's there, but somewhat not so noticeable! Far right, green twitter badge Follow us on Twitter (creating a better one right now)
Thx for checking us out! I'd love to hear what kind of skins every1 would like to see more of. I'll add some more today though :)
Excellent! That may also help future users who may have this problem, Thanks!
Thx alot! :)
Great Background choice! Thx for checking us out!
Me too, I'm wondering if maybe he has a different screen res?
I would love to help, what do you mean by "show up more"?
Thx 4 checking us out I agree with u on wishing 2 be able 2 see more of the bkg but twitter places the feed right in the middle. :(
Thx for your email, I have resized your background down to about 100kb, attached in email. Let me know if u have any more probs:)
Hey there! Could you email your background to info@mytweetspace.com and I'll see about resizing it 4 u. :)
Thank you for reviewing our service! You rock!
We are working on a way 2 have the user manually move the badge up or choose the screen res for their bkg,. I'll keep u updated :)
Is there anything I can help you with? :)
Loving that new Spring Background! Thx for checking out MyTweetSpace!
Thanks for your review on MyTweetSpace.com! Let me know if there is anything I can help you with. :) Love your new bkg!
Very nice background choice, Thanks for checking out MyTweetSpace.com! :)
Awesome new background! Thanks for your tweet!
